CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 4, 1958, pg. 1 reads: "No Gas in Cool Weather - The Mmes. Caroletha Williams and Evelyn Thomas of the Ingram Palace housing project, which is scheduled to be demolished, are shown with 12 of the 16 children in three families living here who are without gas these cool days and nights, because the Euitable [Equitable] Gas Comqpany [Company] removed their meter, recently, for non-payment of six-month-old gas bills. Redevelopment plans call for the families to move, but where?
TitMainTitle: Caroletha Williams and Evelyn Thomas, posed on stoop of dilapidated home in Ingram Palace housing project, with nine children playing with hula hoops in yard, Ingram, Pennsylvania
